text: Le Perrey is a commune in the Eure department in the Normandy region in northern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Fourmetot (the seat), Saint-Ouen-des-Champs and Saint- Thurien.Arrêté préfectoral 21 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Eure department ==References== Category:Communes of Eure Category:States and territories established in 2019
title: Le Perrey
